H0.text: what football team is michael vick on. Atlanta Falcons

H1.text: what football team is michael vick on. New York Jets

H2.text: what football team is michael vick on. Pittsburgh Steelers

H3.text: what football team is michael vick on. Philadelphia Eagles

A4.text: In his final two seasons, Vick played for the New York Jets and Pittsburgh Steelers, primarily as a backup.

A5.text: After serving his sentence, Vick signed with the Philadelphia Eagles for the 2009 season.

A6.text: The Philadelphia Eagles named Michael Vick the starting quarterback going into the 2013 season with much promise running Chip Kelly's fast-paced spread offense.

A7.text: Kevin Kolb, displeased at losing the starting quarterback job to Michael Vick in 2010, was traded to Arizona for Dominique Rodgers-Cromartie.
